name: TuneCraft AI Playlist Generator
description: An agentic LLM service that creates personalized music playlists by analyzing a user's listening history, mood tags, and current chart trends across major streaming platforms (Spotify, Apple Music, YouTube Music). The assistant synthesizes these signals, generates a cohesive track list matching the requested mood and duration, and can push the finished playlist directly to the user's chosen service.

tools.name: fetch_user_history
tools.description: Retrieves the most recent tracks a user has played on a given streaming service. Returns an array of track identifiers and basic metadata.

user_id.description: The unique identifier of the user on the chosen service.

limit.description: Maximum number of recent tracks to return (default 50).

tools.name: fetch_user_mood_tags
tools.description: Analyzes a user's recent listening sessions to infer mood tags such as 'energetic', 'relaxed', or 'melancholic'. Returns a weighted list of moods.

user_id.description: The unique identifier of the user.

items.description: Track identifier from the user's history.

recent_tracks.description: Optional list of track IDs to focus the analysis on; if omitted the service will use the last 30 tracks.

tools.name: fetch_trending_charts
tools.description: Pulls the current top‑N tracks from a streaming service's public charts for a given region and optional genre.

limit.description: Number of top tracks to return (max 100).

tools.name: get_audio_features
tools.description: Retrieves detailed audio characteristics (energy, danceability, valence, tempo, etc.) for a list of track IDs from the specified service.

track_ids.description: Array of track IDs to fetch features for.

tools.name: generate_playlist
tools.description: Creates a playlist composition by selecting tracks that match the supplied seed tracks, desired mood, target energy level, and total duration.

seed_track_ids.description: Track IDs that serve as stylistic anchors.

mood.description: Target mood for the playlist, e.g., 'energetic', 'chill', 'focus'.

length_minutes.description: Approximate total length of the playlist in minutes.

candidate_pool.description: Optional pre‑filtered list of tracks (with audio features) that the algorithm may draw from. If omitted, the service will use the union of the user's history and trending chart tracks.

tools.name: add_playlist_to_service
tools.description: Creates a new playlist on the chosen streaming platform, populates it with the supplied track IDs, and returns a shareable URL.

user_id.description: Identifier of the user who will own the playlist.

playlist_name.description: Desired name for the new playlist.

track_ids.description: Ordered list of track IDs to add.

tools.name: get_user_preferences
tools.description: Fetches explicit user preferences such as favorite genres, disallowed explicit content, and preferred streaming service.

user_id.description: The unique identifier of the user.

examples.description: User requests a 30‑minute upbeat playlist for a morning run. The assistant pulls recent history, mood inference, current pop charts, generates a suitable list, and adds it to the user's Spotify account.

messages.content: You are TuneCraft, an AI playlist curator. Use the provided tools to gather user data, analyze mood, fetch trends, synthesize a playlist, and create it on the user's chosen platform.
Hey TuneCraft, I need a 30‑minute high‑energy playlist for my morning run. Please add it to my Spotify account.
Got it! Let me pull your recent listening history, infer your current mood, and look at what's trending in pop right now.
{"tracks":[{"track_id":"sp_1","name":"Song A"},{"track_id":"sp_2","name":"Song B"}]}
{"moods":[{"tag":"energetic","score":0.78},{"tag":"happy","score":0.62}]}
{"charts":[{"track_id":"sp_101","name":"Hit 1"},{"track_id":"sp_102","name":"Hit 2"}]}
Great, I have your recent tracks, a strong energetic vibe, and the current pop hits. I’ll now fetch audio features for these candidates so I can select the right mix.

{"features":[{"track_id":"sp_1","energy":0.65,"duration_ms":210000},{"track_id":"sp_2","energy":0.58,"duration_ms":195000},{"track_id":"sp_101","energy":0.78,"duration_ms":180000},{"track_id":"sp_102","energy":0.81,"duration_ms":200000}]}
Using those features, I’ll generate a 30‑minute playlist focused on high energy.
Your high‑energy run playlist is ready! I’ll now create it in your Spotify library.
{"playlist_url":"https://open.spotify.com/playlist/xyz123"}
All set! Your new playlist is live: https://open.spotify.com/playlist/xyz123. Enjoy your run!

examples.description: User wants a relaxed, instrumental playlist for studying. The assistant pulls preferences, filters out vocal tracks, and creates a Spotify playlist.

messages.content: You are TuneCraft, an AI that builds custom playlists using the available toolset.
Can you make a 45‑minute instrumental study playlist? Put it on my Spotify.
Sure! I’ll fetch your preferences, recent listening, and the current instrumental charts.
{"preferences":{"favorite_genres":["ambient","classical"],"allow_explicit":false}}
{"tracks":[{"track_id":"sp_a1","name":"Ambient Track 1"},{"track_id":"sp_b2","name":"Piano Piece"}]}
{"charts":[{"track_id":"sp_c3","name":"Chillhop Beat"},{"track_id":"sp_d4","name":"Piano Loops"}]}
I’ll now retrieve audio features so I can filter for low vocal presence and appropriate tempo.

{"features":[{"track_id":"sp_a1","energy":0.35,"duration_ms":240000,"instrumental":true},{"track_id":"sp_b2","energy":0.25,"duration_ms":210000,"instrumental":true},{"track_id":"sp_c3","energy":0.45,"duration_ms":180000,"instrumental":true},{"track_id":"sp_d4","energy":0.30,"duration_ms":200000,"instrumental":true}]}
Generating a 45‑minute instrumental mix that matches your ambient and classical tastes.
{"playlist":["sp_a1","sp_b2","sp_d4","sp_c3"]}
All set! I’ll create the playlist in your Spotify account.
{"playlist_url":"https://open.spotify.com/playlist/abc789"}
Your study playlist is ready: https://open.spotify.com/playlist/abc789. Happy studying!
